entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Donnacona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deschambault 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: SW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
